name: Dark Thoughts (ProSmashy)
description:
This is my first trijam entry, and some bugfixing maybe took a bit more than I thought... but I tried my best to keep it in 3 hours of work.

CONTROLS: arrow keys/AD to move

How it's related to the theme: We all sometimes have those negative thoughts about ourselves and you just want them to leave us  alone. Way before our brain starts to overthink everything...
